raspiejukebox

Class TracksDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • raspiejukebox.TracksDatabase

  • public class TracksDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
    The database of tracks. It is held in memory, and can be updated through a refresh call.
    The module also maintains a cache so that load time is significantly reduced.
    If it is told to use the cache on startup, it will first try to load that, then if it is successful it will refresh the database asynchronously (on a new thread). It it fails then it will refresh the database before continuing.
